original_text: They will use iron and bronze to make the gates of their towns strong. May they be strong for as long as they live. They will use iron and bronze to make the gates of their towns strong.
korean_text: 네 문빗장은 철과 놋이 될 것이니 네가 사는 날을 따라서 능력이 있으리로다

sentences.original_text: They will use iron and bronze
to make the gates of their towns strong
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 도시 성문을 강하게 만들기 위해
